column4: If you get Value Errors all over, it is usually because your option worksheet has gone haywire. The fix is very low tech. Go into the option value worksheet, and in cell B17 of that worksheet (adjusted S), enter any number (say 5) and then undo what you did. Voila!

column1: Value of equity in common stock
